block.p: DIGITAL COURIER TECHNOLOGIES, Park City, Utah, named Becky Takeda chief operating officer. She had been vice president for marketing and investor relations at Smart Modular Technologies.

EXODUS COMMUNICATIONS, Santa Clara, Calif., named Ellen Hancock, chief executive, to the post of chairman. And Don Casey was named president and chief operating officer. He had been president at Wang Global, part of Getronics N.V.
DIGITAL COURIER TECHNOLOGIES, Park City, Utah, named Becky Takeda chief operating officer. She had been vice president for marketing and investor relations at Smart Modular Technologies.

EXODUS COMMUNICATIONS, Santa Clara, Calif., named Ellen Hancock, chief executive, to the post of chairman. And Don Casey was named president and chief operating officer. He had been president at Wang Global, part of Getronics N.V.

ONEHEALTHBANK.COM, Cranbury, N.J., named Joseph Sebastianelli chairman, president and chief executive. He had most recently been chief executive at Scripps Care and executive vice president at Scripps Health.
WORLD WRESTLING FEDERATION ENTERTAINMENT, Stamford, Conn., named Stuart Snyder president and chief operating officer. He succeeds Linda McMahon, chief executive, as president.
